summary: Complete testing of Cannabis Empire - Telegram Mini App farming game. Backend APIs are fully functional with 90.9% success rate. Frontend UI is working perfectly with all navigation, game features, and TON Connect integration operational.

minor_issues.issue: Returns 400 when trying to plant in occupied plot
minor_issues.impact: Expected behavior - plot validation working correctly

passed_tests: API health check - Cannabis Empire API v1.0 operational
Game configuration loaded - crops, shop items, VIP tiers available
Player creation via wallet address - creates player with 1000 coins, 50 gems
Player retrieval by wallet - returns player stats and energy
Garden display - shows 6 plots (4 unlocked, 2 locked) as specified
Shop display - all 4 tabs (Boosts, VIP, Cosmetics, NFTs) functional
Staking system - displays staking info and stake form
Daily reward system - working with streak tracking
Referral system - generates codes and tracks referrals
Frontend navigation - all pages accessible via bottom navigation
Balance bar display - shows coins, gleaf, gems, energy correctly
Crop planting functionality - modal opens, crops selectable, planting works
TON Connect integration - wallet connection button present
Profile page - displays player stats and daily reward claim
